name: Apptension
description:
Apptension is a Poland-based creative software house, focused on creating innovative experiences and solving complex problems. We’re a group of people who live & breathe technology and feel comfortable on the bleeding edge. 
We’re passionate about delivering the most creative and effective solutions possible on time and within the budget. We specialize in crafting responsive web applications and user-friendly e-commerce as well as technically supporting game-changing startups.
